content: a pattern hol ly h at by claudia q description soft and fuzzy hat to keep you toasty and warm throughout the winter it is comprised of simple ribbing and stockinette making it a quick and easy knit that will fly off your needles in no time experience level intermediate beginner materials yarn techniques used a -
